source:
%%sql
-- Build the Service User historic info table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_involvement_dim (
    CaseInvolvementID,
    ContactID,
    CaseReference,
    SUAreaID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    ServiceUserType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT DISTINCT
    Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY T3.case_number NULLS LAST)  AS CaseInvolvementID, -- surrogate key
    T3.contactid                                            AS ContactID,
    T3.case_number                                          AS CaseReference,
    'LegacyID'                                              AS SUAreaID,
    T3.title                                                AS Salutation,
    T3.firstname                                            AS FirstName, 
    T3.lastname                                             AS LastName,
    T3.address1                                             AS AddressLine1,
    T3.address2                                             AS AddressLine2,
    T3.city                                                 AS AddressTown,
    T3.county                                               AS AddressCounty,
    T3.postcode                                             AS Postcode,
    T3.country                                              AS AddressCountry,
    T3.organisationname                                     AS Organisation,
    T3.organisationtypename                                 AS OrganisationType,
    T3.typeofinvolvement                                    AS ServiceUserType,
    'No Info'                                               AS Role,
    T3.telephoneoffice                                      AS TelephoneNumber,
    T3.telephonemobile                                      AS OtherPhoneNumber,
    T3.fax                                                  AS FaxNumber,
    T3.email                                                AS EmailAddress,
    "0"                                                     AS Migrated,
    "Horizon"                                               AS ODTSourceSystem,
    T2.SourceSystemID                                       AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T3.expected_from)                          AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                    AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T3.case_number,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.contactid, '.'),
            IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.email,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'),
            IFNULL(T3.organisationname,'.'),
            IFNULL(T3.typeofinvolvement,'.')
        ))                                                  AS RowID,
    'Y'                                                     AS IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_case_involvement T3
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "Casework" = T2.Description
WHERE T3.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_case_involvement)
